title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up when connecting to a Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons in the Available Items sector are not displayed.
EB:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Expand the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon.
2. Expected Result: The table icons and column icons should show up.
3. Actual Result: The column icons do not show up.
SR:
1. Connect to a Derby database.
2. Expand the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon.
3. Verify that the column icons are not displayed.
